Posts.Content: I was on Femara for 9 month until I hurt so bad head to toe, I couldn't get out of bed.  After 3 month off that, I tried Aromasin.  12 days later my fingers were so puffy and painful I couldn't touch my palms.  My ulcerative colitis also had been in a non-stop flare.  I had an appt that day with the ortho hand Dr.  He said blocking hormones can cause an inflammatory response, I had to get a cortisone shot.  My oncologist told me to stop, I will try tamaxifen next.
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Aromasin

Posts.Content: I don't use Remicade.  I was on femara and it caused a flare up for the last year.  When I stopped the femara, it got better and so did my bone and joint pain.  I still have to consult with my oncologist and gastroenterologist to see what's next.
Posts.Title: Breast cancer with ulcerative colitis
